original_title: Tuition classes for A/Level exam banned from midnight (29)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The conduct of tuition classes, seminars and workshops for the 2023 GCE Advanced Level examination will be prohibited from midnight on Friday (29), until the conclusion of the exam.
The Department of Examinations said the distribution of model question papers and publishing model questions via electronic and print media will also be prohibited.
The Exams Department said legal action will be taken against individuals or groups who engage in such activities.
The 2023 GCE A/Level Exam will be held from the 4th till the 31st of January.
